00009 bool mayAlias(const MemoryWrite& a, const MemoryWrite& b) {
00010     LatticeElement<32> addr1 = a.address;
00011     LatticeElement<32> addr2 = b.address;
00012 
00013     if (addr1.isTop || addr2.isTop)
00014         return false;
00015 
00016     /* Two different unknown values or offsets from two different unknown values. */
00017     if (addr1.name != addr2.name)
00018         return true;
00019 
00020     /* Same unknown base values but inverses (any offset). */
00021     if (addr1.name != 0 && addr1.negate != addr2.negate)
00022         return true;
00023 
00024     /* If they have the same base values (or are both constant) then check the offsets. The 32-bit casts are purportedly
00025      * necessary to wrap propertly, but I'm not sure this will work for addresses (LatticeElements) that have a length other
00026      * than 32 bits. [FIXME RPM 2009-02-03]. */
00027     uint32_t offsetDiff = (uint32_t)(addr1.offset - addr2.offset);
00028     if (offsetDiff < a.len || offsetDiff > (uint32_t)(-b.len))
00029         return true;
00030 
00031     return false;
00032 }
00033 
00035 bool mustAlias(const MemoryWrite& a, const MemoryWrite& b) {
00036     if (!mayAlias(a, b)) return false;
00037     return a.address.name==b.address.name && a.address.offset==b.address.offset;
00038 }

00040 std::ostream&
00041 operator<<(std::ostream& o, const RegisterSet& rs)
00042 {
00043     std::string prefix = "    ";
00044     for (size_t i = 0; i < 8; ++i)
00045         o <<prefix << gprToString((X86GeneralPurposeRegister)i) << " = " << rs.registers.gpr[i] << std::endl;
00046     for (size_t i = 0; i < 6; ++i)
00047         o <<prefix << segregToString((X86SegmentRegister)i) << " = " << rs.registers.segreg[i] << std::endl;
00048     for (size_t i = 0; i < 16; ++i)
00049         o <<prefix << flagToString((X86Flag)i) << " = " << rs.registers.flag[i] << std::endl;
00050     o <<prefix << "memory = ";
00051     if (rs.memoryWrites->get().isTop) {
00052         o <<prefix << "<top>\n";
00053     } else if (rs.memoryWrites->get().writes.empty()) {
00054         o <<"{}\n";
00055     } else {
00056         o <<"{\n";
00057         for (size_t i = 0; i < rs.memoryWrites->get().writes.size(); ++i) {
00058             o <<prefix <<"    "
00059               <<"size=" <<rs.memoryWrites->get().writes[i].len
00060               << "; addr=" <<rs.memoryWrites->get().writes[i].address
00061               << "; value=" <<rs.memoryWrites->get().writes[i].data
00062               <<"\n";
00063         }
00064         o <<prefix << "}\n";
00065     }
00066     return o;
00067 }
